title: League client, patcher, ingame all messed up
body: So recently, while patching, ingame, or just in the client, my entire computer just freezes (including Spotify/ other background apps) for a few minutes. It is especially bad ingame, as it takes super long to unfreeze and then the game crashes. The crashes are followed by a bugsplat.  Also really weird is that when I force shut down my computer during one of these freezes, my computer always experiences startup issues (i get a missing startup disk error) that are a pain to resolve. I know that the startup issues seem to be unrelated to league, but they literally only happen after a league freeze. Nothing else I do on my computer causes these freezes/startup issues. I have tried repairing the client, uninstalling/reinstalling, etc. I have a macOS Sierra. Any help would be greatly appreciated, as I have no idea what the hell is going on rn. Thanks!

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some hardware failure or issues going on here. I'd ensure your gear is all good by running the [Apple Diagnostic Tests.](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202731) If you see any failure, you may want to visit your nearest Apple-certified repair shop or an Apple store. 

Let me know the results of those tests!
